title: League of legends freezing at 15-20 minutes
body: lately ive been freezing in between 15-20 minutes into the game making me unable to play the game freezes in fullscreen and im unable to do anything and is forced to restart the computer this happens in EVERY game i have tried reinstalling league of legends but that didnt help

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  It sounds like you might have the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) enabled.  Disabling this should do the trick, but you might want to test it in a custom game to be sure!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JEqcVIZZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-29T18:04:45.139+0000)
>
> Are you on Windows 10?  It sounds like you might have the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) enabled.  Disabling this should do the trick, but you might want to test it in a custom game to be sure!

disabled it and reinstall league freshly nothing happend
